Datos

MathJax handles inline expressions like: x2+y2=z2x^2 + y^2 = z^2x2+y2=z2 or block expressions like: DρDt=0.\frac{D\rho}{Dt} = 0.DtDρ​=0.

: The first text in the request, conventionally is one of 4 words in all caps. The backend gets to decide how to process different HTTP methods differently.

Quadratic equation root: When a≠0a \ne 0a=0 , there are two solutions to ax2+bx+c=0ax^2 + bx + c = 0ax2+bx+c=0 and they are x=−b±b2−4ac2a.x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.x=2a−b±b2−4ac​​.

Sum: ∑i=0ni2=(n2+n)(2n+1)6\sum_{i=0}^n i^2 = \frac{(n^2+n)(2n+1)}{6}i=0∑n​i2=6(n2+n)(2n+1)​

Limit: lim⁡x→0\lim_{x\to 0}x→0lim​

Sqrt: (xy3)\left(\frac{\sqrt x}{y^3}\right)(y3x​​)

Alternatively you can use https://www.codecogs.com to render expression to image and include it in Markdown.

  1. 💡 edit this Note to see the syntax
  2. 💡 if math expressions are not rendered, then you must enable MathJax using menu Mind/Adapt/Markdown

MathJax cheetsheet:

  • use $ to inline expressions, and $$ for blocks
  • superscript: x2x^2x2
  • subscript: xix_ixi​
  • superscript and subscript: xi2x^2_ixi2​
  • Greek letters: α,β,δ...ω,Δ,...Ω\alpha, \beta, \delta ... \omega, \Delta, ... \Omegaα,β,δ...ω,Δ,...Ω
  • groups: for 10^10 you get 101010^101010 , but 10^{10} gives 101010^{10}1010 .
  • parenthesis: [, ( and use \{ for curly braces
  • fraction: 23\frac{2}{3}32​ a+bc−d\frac{a+b}{c-d}c−da+b​
  • square: 10\sqrt{10}10​ xy3\sqrt[3]{\frac xy}3yx​​
  • exponential: 282^828
  • absolute: ∣x∣\vert{x}\vert∣x∣
  • metric: ∥x∥\Vert{x}\Vert∥x∥
  • interval: ⟨x,y⟩\langle x, y \rangle⟨x,y⟩
  • sum: ∑xi\sum x_i∑xi​
  • integral: ∫xi\int x_i∫xi​ ∬xi\iint x_i∬xi​ ∭xi\iiint x_i∭xi​
  • union: x∪yx \cup yx∪y , ⋃x\bigcup x⋃x
  • intersection: x∩yx \cap yx∩y , ⋂x\bigcap x⋂x
  • limit: lim⁡x→0\lim_{x\to 0}limx→0​
  • goniometrical: sin⁡x\sin xsinx
  • bigger/smaller: <>≤≤≦⩽≥≥≧⩾\lt \gt \le \leq \leqq \leqslant \ge \geq \geqq \geqslant<>≤≤≦⩽≥≥≧⩾
  • not using n : ≠\neq=
  • sets: ∪∩∖⊂⊆⊊⊃∈∉∅∅\cup \cap \setminus \subset \subseteq \subsetneq \supset \in \notin \emptyset \varnothing∪∩∖⊂⊆⊊⊃∈∈/∅∅
  • combinatorics: (n+12k)\binom{n+1}{2k}(2kn+1​)
  • arrows: →→←⇒⇐↦\to \rightarrow \leftarrow \Rightarrow \Leftarrow \mapsto→→←⇒⇐↦
  • statements and proofs: ∧∨¬∀∃⊤⊥⊢⊨\land \lor \lnot \forall \exists \top \bot \vdash \vDash∧∨¬∀∃⊤⊥⊢⊨
  • long dots: …\ldots…
  • infinity: ∞ℵ0∇∂\infty \aleph_0 \nabla \partial∞ℵ0​∇∂
  • limits: ϵε\epsilon \varepsilonϵε
  • vectors and hats: x^,yˉ,abc‾,x⃗\hat x, \bar y, \overline{abc}, \vec xx^,yˉ​,abc,x
